OOC Ryo Lunarpine and Koj are supposed to be on the same side.You have until
I reply tomorrow morning, or this post stands..



The scent suddenly changed. THe scent had become an irritating hot smell
that masked the others. now there was no way of knowing whether or not the
trainers were planning an ambush. The change in the air came from behind
them so it had to have been from another Maximal. If there was an ambush and
someone got hurt because Lunarpine couldn't smell it there would be the pit
to pay for the one who did this.
----- Original Message -----
From: RYO D <striderzero1@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, October 09, 2000 2:40 PM
Subject: Lunarpine only Warning


> ::Koj::
> Koj doesn't pay any attention to the novices opinion's of his tactics and
is
> more concerned with Lunarpine smelling the area. Thinks a what master
> Fe-Ling said.
>
>
> ::Fe-Ling::
> "Son Koj a ninja can take on many disguises but ones scent always remains
> the same even in disguise never allow your scent to be aquired by any
beast
> then you find you lose the advantage of surprise."
>
> ::Koj::
> Koj quickly reacts as the slot on his right arm releases a baseball sized
> Pepper Bomb. Koj takes the ball and crushes it swiftly releasing a quick
> colorless strong odor as he spins his lance extreme fast blowing it
towards
> in Lunarpine. ((The odor will mess with everyones nose in the area it will
> make your eyes water and nose if you have one burn like its on fire
locking
> out any scent but spicy peppers.))Koj nose burns but he forgets the
feeling
> as he enters battle mode his armor closes of all access to his joints for
> protection "Lunarpine if so much as try and smell me or Inu, I'll remove
> F**king nose!" Koj thrust the lance into the ground to let him know this
is
> no joke.
>
